headline: Formo Raises $50M to Scale Animal-Free Dairy Production
summary: German startup Formo secured funding to expand its precision-fermentation-based vegan cheese production capabilities.

headline: Bolt Threads Partners with Adidas for Mylo Leather Apparel
summary: Bolt Threads collaborates with Adidas to incorporate Mylo, its mushroom-based leather alternative, into apparel lines.

headline: Solar Foods Factory Opens, Producing Solein Protein from Air
summary: Solar Foods commences production at its factory, using gas fermentation to create Solein, a protein from air.

headline: Modern Meadow Bio-leather Material Used in Luxury Car Interiors
summary: Modern Meadow's lab-grown leather alternative is adopted by a luxury automaker for its vehicle interiors.

headline: Perfect Day Announces Ice Cream Partnership with Major Retailer
summary: Perfect Day's animal-free dairy protein is used in a new ice cream line sold through a major retail chain.

headline: Algiknit Secures Funding for Seaweed-Based Yarn Production
summary: Algiknit receives investment to scale its production of biodegradable yarn made from seaweed.

headline: Nature's Fynd Announces Expansion into European Markets
summary: Nature's Fynd, producer of fungi-based foods, expands its distribution to European countries.

headline: Mango Materials Partners to Create PHA-Based Packaging
summary: Mango Materials collaborates on creating packaging using PHA, a biodegradable plastic alternative.

headline: Air Protein Receives Regulatory Approval for Novel Protein
summary: Air Protein secures regulatory clearance for its air-based protein, paving the way for commercialization.

headline: BioMason Raises Series B to Expand Production of Bio-bricks
summary: BioMason secures funding to increase production capacity of its cement-free bio-bricks.
